titles.title: Debt Limit Increase resolution
Increased Public Debt resolution
Increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.

action.text: The Chair announced that pursuant to Rule XXVII, as a result of the adoption by the House and the Senate of the conference report on H. Con. Res. 95, H. J. Res. 51, increasing the statutory limit on the public debt, has been engrossed and is deemed to have passed the House on April 11, 2003.
Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 80.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 44. Record Vote Number: 202.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/27/2003--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was passed by the House on April 11, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Amends Federal law to increase the statutory limit on the public debt from $6.4 trillion to $7.384 trillion.
